attributes.action: outlaw the burning of an effigy of HH. Pope Paul V (or any other Pope) on Bonfire Night
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Bonfire night will be 402 years since the failed attempt to blow up the Houses of Parliament - in today's society it seems distasteful and offensive to burn effigies of anyone. However, the practice of making an effigy of Pope Paul V or of the reigning Pontiff is particularly offensive to loyal subjects who are Catholics.
